mdException.name: com.runwaysdk.system.metadata.CreateBackupException
mdException.label: Create Backup Exception
mdException.description: Generic wrapper for IOExceptions when creating a backup file.
mdException.message: There was a problem reading/writing [{location}], your backup has failed. Check that the system has permissions to write to the requested location and that your hard disk has enough space.

mdException.name: com.runwaysdk.system.metadata.BackupReadException
mdException.label: Backup Read Exception
mdException.description: Generic wrapper for IOExceptions when reading a backup file.
mdException.message: There was a problem reading/writing [{location}], your restore has failed. Check that the file exists, the system has permissions, and that your backup can be unzipped properly.

mdException.name: com.runwaysdk.system.metadata.CorruptBackupException
mdException.label: Corrupt Backup Exception
mdException.description: Thrown when a user attemps to restore a backup which is corrupt.
mdException.message: The backup named [{backupName}] is corrupt. Check that the backup can be unzipped properly, it may have been corrupted during transfer.

mdException.name: com.runwaysdk.system.metadata.RestoreAppnameException
mdException.label: Restore Appname Exception
mdException.description: Thrown when a user attempts to restore a backup on the wrong app.
mdException.message: The app name specified in the backup [{restoreAppname}] does not match the requested restore app [{currentAppname}].
